Interrupts.Name: Trick of the Light
Interrupts.Trigger: An ally is targeted by an attack or ability from a foe.
Interrupts.Effect: That ally gains evasion against that attack or ability. After it resolves, teleport that ally 3 spaces to their 'real' location.

Actions.Name: Legerdemain
Actions.Description: Place a valuables token down, then teleport all valuables tokens on the battlefield to any free space within 3 spaces of a character.
